Package il.co.hac.edu.yekhezkelyo.ex1

Interface OpCodes

public interface OpCodes
This is an enumeration of the different op-codes. The reason this is an interface and not an enum is that using an enum against user input requires a fairly elaborate process of conversions between the enum and the input values. On the other hand, the added value of a Java enum - being a defined type and thus creating value ranges that are validatable by the compiler, is not needed here, since all this enumeration is used for is getting a value from the user and using it to pull a checker from a factory. A class is not used simply because it is not needed here. What's left is an interface, which has the added value of implicitly making all members public static and final.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static char OP_CONTENT_TYPE
    Indicates checking the URLs content type.
    static char OP_IMAGE
    Indicates checking if a URL contains images.
    static char OP_LANGUAGE
    Indicates checking if a URL is written in a specific language.
    static char OP_QUIT
    Used by the user to tell the application to stop executing.
    static char OP_WORD
    Indicates checking if a URL contains a set of words.
